font.marquee: -----#GoCrofton ----- School is Closed for all activities through May 31st -----

div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 15:56 pm CDT

div.div: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. South southeast wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 78. Southwest wind 6 to 8 mph becoming north northeast in the afternoon.

A chance of showers and thunderstorms, then showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm after 3am. Increasing clouds, with a low around 55. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

div.p: Use the following link for the State's Directed Health Measure. School will continue to operate online or through enrichment packets off site as we are now through the remainder of the school year! All extra-curricular activities are cancelled. We will continue to look at options for graduation at a later date.

a.aria-label: Read more about Directed Health Measure

div.p: Food service will begin Monday 3/23/20! Use the link or attachment for information on our plan: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HODoiY3rl0I9alU_jcjq0qNifndHnJxY/view?usp=sharing

a.aria-label: Read more about Food Service to begin Monday 3/23/2020
